page.title: 09SIMON,A TEENAGER OF ASHBY
page.content: I get up at 7.30am and sit on the settee until my mum brings me a cup of coffee.I have cereals and coffee for breakfast then I go into the bathroom. At 8am I get ready for school,get my bike out of the shed and speed down Burton Rd.to school. After school I get home at 3.55pm and watch TV until 5pm when I have my dinner.Sometimes I play out on my bike but on Thursdays I go to Judo at Ivanhoe Youth Club in the gym. I go to bed at 10pm. I like fishing,football,rugby and judo. My favorite TV programme is Minder on ITV My favorite pop star is Michael Jackson. My name is SIMON HEWITT I am 13yrs.
